TopicTitle: Easy Way to Get to Kerbin's North and South Pole?

Articles.Content:
Is there an easy way to get to Kerbin's North and South Poles?

I want to plant a flag there.
Either fly there with an atmospheric plane, or do a sub-orbital hop with a rocket.

ICBM with parshuted landing works mostly for me. Fire suborbital and land with parashute with some trys you get in 100m range.

And you get there with tier 2 space capable parts. Or a space glider. The most fun is to build something crazy and try out if this works.

Funny Kabooms 

Urses
Last time I went to one of the poles I flew there (atmospheric)

Between the Administration Building and the Astronaut Complex there is a small... No, wait!  

The fast way to go is pointing a strong enough rocket in the correct direction,  launch and parachute landing at the destination. 

A plane is not so fast but more precise. Also more convenient if multiple stops along the way are planned. 

Finally,  if time is not a issue,  a kerbal walking/swimming will eventually get there.  (But DON'T!) 

In any case remember to account for the coriolis effect.
